title: Camera app closes immediately after opening it
content:
my device is Pixel 3xl, after upgrading to android 11, if i open google camera app it closes immediately without any feedback message also all apps now can't access the camera.
tried to install 3rd party camera app but i end up with this error message: 
Failed to open camera.
camera maybe in use by another application?

solutions that i tried:
1. clear cache and storage then force stop camera app.
2. restart in safe mode.
3.reset app preference

your help and support is highly appreciated.
